title: Multispectral Imaging Could Reveal Secrets Of Martellus Map
teaser: A team of researchers are using multispectral imaging to uncover hidden text on a 1491 Martellus map, one of the most important maps in history. Lead researcher Chet Van Duzer thinks the discoveries will allow historians and scholars to see just how the map influenced cartography in its time.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
